caller_intent: Adrian is calling to correct an error in a claim filed for a court bar incident, specifically the incorrect date (used yesterday instead of Friday, the 22nd), and to ensure the policyholder (Tony) is properly contacted for further details.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the incident occurred on Friday, the 22nd, and noted the need to update the date in the system (data loss change).
Agent mentioned initiating a policy change and data loss change in the system.
Agent coordinated with the policyholder (Tony) via text to request follow-up contact.
Agent clarified that the minor claimant (17-year-old) cannot provide a recorded statement and that the policyholder (Tony) is the primary contact.
Agent confirmed Adrian's contact number (336-331-6327) for future communication.
knowledge_required: System workflows for data loss and policy changes
systems_referenced: Internal claim management system (data loss change, policy change)
summary: Adrian contacted the agent to correct a claim date error (Friday, 22nd instead of yesterday) and ensure the policyholder (Tony) is contacted. The agent agreed to update the claim details, initiate policy changes, and coordinate follow-up with Tony via text. Adrian provided his contact information for future reference.
